name: ProgressViewStyleConfiguration
desc: The properties of a progress view instance.

items.name: var label: ProgressViewStyleConfiguration.Label?
items.desc: A view that describes the task represented by the progress view.

items.name: struct Label
items.desc: A type-erased label describing the task represented by the progress view.

items.name: var currentValueLabel: ProgressViewStyleConfiguration.CurrentValueLabel?
items.desc: A view that describes the current value of a progress view.

items.name: struct CurrentValueLabel
items.desc: A type-erased label that describes the current value of a progress view.

items.name: let fractionCompleted: Double?
items.desc: The completed fraction of the task represented by the progress view, from 0.0 (not yet started) to 1.0 (fully complete), or nil if the progress is indeterminate.
